sentences.en: ...the originator of the theory of relativity.
A generic medicine is an equivalent of an originator pharmaceutical product.
sentences.cn: 另外文中也提到了关于一些药品的专利权问题.

sentences.en: An originator of a line of descent ; a precursor.
sentences.cn: 他把一段文字缩成一行.

sentences.en: Document and report all observations and results to originator of lab request.
sentences.cn: 反馈并报告所有的观察和试验结果给申请人.

sentences.en: Dow theory is the originator of the technical analysis school.
sentences.cn: 道氏理论是技术分析流派的鼻祖.

sentences.en: He was noted as the originator of the'short attack ".
sentences.cn: 他以 “ 短促突击战 ” 创始者著称.

sentences.en: Li Shizhen was the originator of the Chinese pharmacology.
sentences.cn: 李时珍是我国医药界的鼻祖.

sentences.en: Lu Ban was the originator of architecture.
sentences.cn: 鲁班是建筑工匠的祖师.

sentences.en: N - succinimidyl - 5 - iodo - 3 - pyridinecarboxylate ( SIPC ) is also synthesized as a stan - ( dard ) reference material.
sentences.cn: 在此基础上,合成了 5- 碘 -3- 吡啶甲酸 -N- 琥珀酰亚胺酯 ( SIPC ) .

sentences.en: Noah is also said to have been the originator of vineyard cultivation.
sentences.cn: 诺亚也被传说为是葡萄园耕种的创始者.

sentences.en: The earliest originator was Dr. Giterman who worked at the British Rehabilitation Center for the Disabled.
sentences.cn: 最早的发起人是在英国残疾康复中心工作的吉特曼博士.

sentences.en: The home server attribute cannot be determined for the message originator selected.
sentences.cn: 无法确定选择的邮件原始发件人的主服务器属性.

sentences.en: The Originator or someone else decided to cancel an a roved change.
sentences.cn: 发起人或其他相关人员决定取消已批准的变更.

sentences.en: The source from which something arises; an originator.
sentences.cn: 起因其它事物发生的起源; 起因.

sentences.en: Tool sends e - mail to the assigned Modifier and the Originator.
sentences.cn: 变更控制工具 发电子邮件 给已指定的修改人和发起人.

sentences.en: Written work orders are returned to the originator for appropriate follow up.
sentences.cn: 工作单需交还发单人做适当记录.

words.tran_cn: 有创作力的；有发明之才能的

trans.tran_cn: 创作者，发起人，开山祖，起因
trans.tran_en: the person who first has the idea for something and starts it
